name: d3-local-query
description: Run SQL-like SELECT statements on data from d3.dsv

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -f umd -n d3.local_query index.js | babel -f index.js -o build/d3-local-query.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-local-query.js -c -m -o build/d3-local-query.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/d3-local-query.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-local-query.js build/d3-local-query.min.js

author: Allison Hancock <aahancoc@umich.edu>
